summary: Expert Estimator with 15 years in Civil & Infrastructure, delivering $420M projects, specializing in cost estimating and project management, with a track record of enhancing project value by 12%.

bullets.text: Analyzed tender documents and delivered first principle estimates for diverse civil construction projects, enhancing accuracy by 32%.
Prepared comprehensive Bill of Quantities (BOQ) and tender documents that supported winning bids, resulting in contracts worth $45M USD.
Executed detailed quantity take-off for foundations, architectural, structural, and interior designs, increasing resource allocation efficiency by 26%.
Managed cost estimating and requests for proposal with suppliers for MEP installations, reducing procurement time by 18% and saving $200K annually.
Assessed additional costs for design variations, maintaining project budget adherence within a 5% variance.
Conducted final account preparation and cost analysis between various design stages, increasing budget accuracy by 34%.
Oversaw project development and budget adjustments on awarded projects like LDS Temple Complex, enhancing overall project value by 12%.
Conducted in-depth tender analysis and budget projections, delivering cost-efficient solutions that won 15 contracts totaling $120M AUD.
Compiled BOQs incorporating precise labor, materials, and equipment costs, reducing project overruns by 15%.
Led multi-discipline project take-offs for infrastructure undertakings, optimizing resource utilization by 30%.
Reviewed and integrated complementary tender documents, ensuring comprehensive bid proposals that resulted in a 40% bid success rate.
Optimized processes through cost consulting, achieving savings of up to 25% on supply contracts.
Engineered alternative construction methodologies to meet budget constraints, increasing bid competitiveness by 18%.
Presented detailed financial insights to contractors, influencing project decisions favorably and raising stakeholder engagement scores by 11%.
Conducted comprehensive project scope analysis, increasing bid accuracy and bringing in $50M USD in contracts.
Streamlined cost estimation processes, achieving a 22% faster turnaround in bid document preparation.
Facilitated detailed BOQ development for award-winning projects like TRYP By Wyndham, securing contracts worth $60M USD.
Cross-collaborated with site and management teams, leading to seamless project delivery and client satisfaction improvements.
Executed final account preparations, ensuring project closure documentation accuracy exceeded industry benchmarks by 18%.
Resolved client disputes through expert cost analysis and negotiation, maintaining a 100% resolution rate.
Drafted construction site layouts, optimizing space and workflow efficiency by 15%.
Managed detailed quantity take-offs, enhancing design-to-cost alignment by 20% for high-rise residential projects.
Orchestrated BOQ preparations that streamlined financing approvals at a rate 19% above industry average.
Conducted feasibility studies for land purchases, securing potential developments valued at $35M USD.
Conducted feasibility cost studies and design follow-up for warehouse projects, reducing overruns by 15%.
Developed financial programs for large-scale logistics facilities, achieving a 25% improvement in budgeting accuracy.
Accounted for additional costs in design variations for the IGESP Hospital, maintaining project margins on $25M USD facilities.
Produced precise cost estimates and tender documents that captured significant market share across commercial and medical center projects.
Optimized project compatibility and addressed execution discrepancies, reducing project delivery timelines by 20%.

additionalExperience: Member of AIQS; Construction Management specialization from Columbia University in progress; Autodesk Revit training.
